items.sentence: Tom thought that Mary wouldn\'t have to do that.
Excuse me, but would you please open the window?
Half of the apples that Tom gave me were rotten.
Tom was fired for constantly being late to work.
Tom was gunned down just outside the courthouse.
I\'m surprised they didn\'t have anything to do.
I\'m the one who paid for Tom\'s French lessons.
Many dog owners only feed their dogs once a day.
Mary asked Tom if she could eat the last cookie.
Women aren\'t exactly throwing themselves at me.
Does she have enough energy to take a long trip?
We\'re in the process of writing the report now.
We\'ve got to finish this before we can go home.
I wasn\'t the one who told Tom where Mary lives.
I went over to Tom\'s house yesterday afternoon.
I went to Tom\'s house the night before he died.
Tom read a magazine while he waited for the bus.
Once Tom starts talking, it\'s hard to stop him.
Only thirty people showed up for Tom\'s recital.
Tom told me he was going to go home early today.
